examples.example: 这位画家凭借自己精湛的技艺创作出了许多令人赞叹的作品。

translate.english: This painter has created many amazing works with his exquisite skills.

examples.example: 那位画家以独特的视角和细腻的笔触描绘出了世间的美好。

translate.english: That painter depicted the beauty of the world with a unique perspective and delicate brushstrokes.

examples.example: 这位画家以其充满创意的构思和灵动的画笔展现了生活的多彩。

translate.english: This painter has shown the colorful life with his creative conception and flexible paintbrush.
